Nettie Olive Delong1

F, #63420, b. 11 September 1886, d. 1952

Father*: Joseph Delong1 b. 1860

Mother*: Emerilla Poole b. 4 Oct 1853

Birth*: 11 September 1886; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Date Sep 11 1886 & location Ont. rural per 1901 Census. Date 1887 & location Brighton Twp. per marr. reg'n. Date 1886 per Memorial.1,2,3

Marriage*: 9 September 1908; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#014415: Groom: Allan Albert Tackabury; Age: 19; Res. & Born: Brighton Twp.; Status: bachelor; Occ.: farmer; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: David Tackabury & Mary Town; Bride: Nettie Olive De Long; Age: 21; Res. & Born: Brighton; Status: spinster; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Jos. De Long & Emmerilla Poole; Wit.: Mrs. L. S. Wright & Pearl Glenn, Brighton; Date: Sep 9 1908; Performed by: L. S. Wright (Ontario Marriage Registration, #014415-1908, ancestry.com); Principal=Allan Albert Tackaberry4

Death*: 1952; Ontario; Date 1952 per Memorial.3

Burial*: 1952; McPhail's Cemetery, Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Memorial: (See Exhibit) Allan A. Tackabury; 1888 - 1962; His Wife; Nettie O. Delong; 1886 - 1952; TACKABURY (McPhail's Cemetery, June 21 2009)3

Census*: April 1901; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 14 at 1901 Census: see Bruce Tackaberry (brother-in-law)2

Residence*: 26 December 1906; Brighton Twp., Hilton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Witness at marriage of George Willis DeLong and Jennett Louisa Rittwage.1

Married Name: 9 September 1908; Tackaberry1

Family: Allan Albert Tackaberry b. 29 Aug 1889, d. 1962

Marriage*: 9 September 1908; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#014415: Groom: Allan Albert Tackabury; Age: 19; Res. & Born: Brighton Twp.; Status: bachelor; Occ.: farmer; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: David Tackabury & Mary Town; Bride: Nettie Olive De Long; Age: 21; Res. & Born: Brighton; Status: spinster; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Jos. De Long & Emmerilla Poole; Wit.: Mrs. L. S. Wright & Pearl Glenn, Brighton; Date: Sep 9 1908; Performed by: L. S. Wright (Ontario Marriage Registration, #014415-1908, ancestry.com); Principal=Allan Albert Tackaberry4

Mother*: Ann Lyden b. 1836, d. 12 Jul 1905

Marriage*: before 1885; per marriage reg'n. of daughter Nettie Olive (Delong) Tackabury.; Principal=Emerilla Poole

Census*: April 1871; Cramahe Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 11 at 1871 Census: see Thomas Delong2

George Willis Delong1,2,3,4

M, #63422, b. 18 January 1889, d. 28 June 1937

Father*: Joseph Delong2 b. 1860

Mother*: Emerilla Poole2 b. 4 Oct 1853

Birth*: 18 January 1889; Brighton Twp., Hilton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Birth Reg'n.#025020: Name: Willis DeLong; Date: Jan 18 1889; Parents: Joseph DeLong & Ameritta Poole; Inf.: Joseph DeLong, lab., Brighton Twp.; Reg'd.: Feb 25 1889; Phys.: Dr. McDonald; Reg'r.: A.A. Becker, Brighton Twp. (Ontario Birth Registration, #025020-1889, ancestry.ca) Date Jan 18 1889 & location Hilton per Death Reg'n. Date 1888 & location Ont. per 1921 Census. Date Jan 18 1888 & location Ont. rural per 1901 Census. Date 1888 per marriage reg'n. - Jennett Louisa Rittwage.2,3,5,4,6

Marriage*: 26 December 1906; Trenton, Hastings Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#010170: Groom: Geo. Willis De Long; Age: 18; Res.: Trenton; Born: Brighton Twp.; Status: bachelor; Occ.: lab.; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Joseph De Long & Emma Pole; Bride: Jennett Louisa Rithuage; Age: 20; Res.: Brighton Twp.; Born: - ; Status: spinster; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Arthur Rithuage & Sarah Ann Wicks; Wit.: Chas. Wilkin & Nettie De Long, Hilton; Date: Dec 26 1906; Place: Trenton; Performed by: Rev. R. Bamforth, Madoc; Reg'd.: Dec 6 1909 (Ontario Marriage Registration, #010170-1906, ancestry.ca); Principal=Jennett Louisa "Annette" Rittwage7

Death*: 28 June 1937; Conc 2 Lot 4, Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Death Reg'n.#026790: Name: George Willis DeLong; Date: Jun 28 1937; Age: 48y 5m 10d; Res.: Conc 2, Lot 4, Brighton Twp., entire life; Born: Jan 18 1889; Nat.: French; Status: married; Spouse: Jennett L. Rittwage; Parents: Jos. DeLong, b. Ont. & Amerilla Poole, b. Brighton Twp.; Inf.: Jennett DeLong, RR# 4, Brighton, wife; Burial: Woods Cemetery, Jul 1 1937; Und.: B.E. Brintnell, Brighton; Cause: coronary thrombosisi, unatended; Phys.: H.c. Rundle, Coronoer, Brighton; Reg'd.: Jun 29 1937; Reg'r.: Fred O. Wade, Brighton (Ontario Death Registration, #026790-1937, ancestry.ca)8

Burial*: 1 July 1937; Woods Cemetery, Cramahe Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Date July 1 1937 & location Woods Cemetery per Death Reg'n.6

Census*: April 1901; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 13 at 1901 Census: see Bruce Nichols (brother-in-law)2

Residence*: 26 December 1906; Brighton Twp., Northumbeland Co., Ontario; Residence Brighton Twp. per marriage reg'n. - Jennett Louisa Rittwage.3

Census: 11 June 1921; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 33 at 1921 Census: DeLong, George W., 33, b. Ont., p.b. Ont., farm lab., married; Nettie ?,34, b. Ont., p.b. Ont., Eng., Meth., married; Julia L., 14, dau.; Robert W., 12, son; Rex, 4, son (1921 Census: Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., dist. 107, sub-dist. 2, pg. 5, line 41 - ancestry.ca)4

Residence: 18 March 1924; Conc 3 Lot 3, Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Land Registry Records (Grant 11030) show that Goldwin S. Langdon & wife sold part of Lot 3, conc 3, Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co. to George W. DeLong for $500. ITS Date: Mar 18 1924. Reg'n. Date: Mar 22 1924. (Ontario Land Registry Records, Northumberland Co., Brighton Twp., Conc 3, lot 3, pg. 057 of 320, page copied from OnLand.ca by Dan Buchanan, Apr 13 2020.)9

Family: Jennett Louisa "Annette" Rittwage b. 26 Aug 1886, d. 1950

Marriage*: 26 December 1906; Trenton, Hastings Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#010170: Groom: Geo. Willis De Long; Age: 18; Res.: Trenton; Born: Brighton Twp.; Status: bachelor; Occ.: lab.; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Joseph De Long & Emma Pole; Bride: Jennett Louisa Rithuage; Age: 20; Res.: Brighton Twp.; Born: - ; Status: spinster; Rel.: Meth.; Parents: Arthur Rithuage & Sarah Ann Wicks; Wit.: Chas. Wilkin & Nettie De Long, Hilton; Date: Dec 26 1906; Place: Trenton; Performed by: Rev. R. Bamforth, Madoc; Reg'd.: Dec 6 1909 (Ontario Marriage Registration, #010170-1906, ancestry.ca); Principal=Jennett Louisa "Annette" Rittwage7

Hugh Charles Bibby1,2,3

M, #63427, b. 26 March 1878, d. February 1961

Father*: Edwin Bibby2 b. 31 May 1835, d. 2 Feb 1916

Mother*: Jane Morris2 b. Jun 1842, d. 2 May 1905

Birth*: 26 March 1878; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Late Birth Reg'n.#901122: Name: Hugh Charles Biby; Date: Mar 26 1878; Parents: Edwin Bibby, Merchant, Brighton & Jane Morris; Phys.: Dr. Fife; Inf.: Edwin Maurice Bibby, brother, Brighton; Reg'd.: Jun 14 1946 (Ontario Late Birth Registration, #901122-1946, ancestry.com) Date Mar 1878 per Memorial & CemSearch. Date Mar 26 1878 & location Brighton per FindaGrave.4,5,6,3

Death*: February 1961; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Date Feb 1961 per Memorial & CemSearch. Date Feb 1961 & location Brighton per FindaGrave.5,6,3

Burial*: February 1961; Mount Hope Cemetery, Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Memorial: (See Exhibit) Hugh C. Bibby; Mar 1878 - Feb 1961 (Mount Hope Cemetery, Brighton, June 30 2008)

CemSearch: Name: Hugh C. Bibby; Born: Mar 1878; Died: Feb 1961; ID: MTHOPE249; Other names: Bibby, Edwin (1835-1916), Bibby, Jane [Morris] ( -1905), Nesbitt, Marie V. [Bibby] (1881-1950); Cemetery: Mount Hope Cemetery, Conc A, Lot 35, Brighton Twp., Brighton Village, Northumberland Co., Sec 1 Row 13 (https://www.cemsearch.ca/burial/?pID=MTHOPE249%5E2)

FindaGrave: Name: Hugh Charles Bibby; BIRTH: 26 Mar 1878, Brighton, Northumberland County, Ontario, Canada;

DEATH: Feb 1961 (aged 82), Brighton, Northumberland County, Ontario, Canada; BURIAL: Mount Hope Cemetery, Brighton, Northumberland County, Ontario, Canada; PLOT: Row Section #A-13; MEMORIAL ID: 142569601; Note: Son of Maurice Edwin Bibby and Jane Morris. (https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/142569601/hugh-charles-bibby?_gl=1*19r3z2c*_gcl_au*MTg0NDkwNTU3Mi4xNzA2NjI0OTQ3*_ga*NTYwMjIyMjkyLjE2NzQ5Mzg5MDg.*_ga_4QT8FMEX30*MGVmZTY2YjYtMjU4MS00YjBiLThmY2UtOGYzZmIwMGE0N2UwLjkyOS4xLjE3MTA5NDg0NDMuNTMuMC4w*_ga_QPQNV9XG1B*MGVmZTY2YjYtMjU4MS00YjBiLThmY2UtOGYzZmIwMGE0N2UwLjQ2MC4xLjE3MTA5NDg0NDMuMC4wLjA.)5,6,3

Census: April 1881; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 3 at 1881 Census: see Edwin Bibby7

Census: April 1891; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 12 at 1891 Census: see Edwin Bibby8

Census*: April 1901; 10 Young St., Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 24 at 1901 Census: see Edwin Bibby9

Residence*: circa 1930; Brighton Twp., Orland, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Hugh Bibby appears in The Latimer Photos which were taken by Hugh Latimer in the late 1920s and early 1930s at his father's General Store in Orland. (The Latimer Photos, Codrington Public Library)10

Census: 26 June 1931; Prince Edward St., Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 53 at 1931 Census: Bibby, Hugh, 53, b. Ont., p.b. Wales, Welsh, Bapt., clerk at dry goods store, boarder, single (1931 Census: Brighton Village, Northumberland Co., dist. 133, sub-dist 58, pg. 28, line 33 - Ward 3, Prince Edward St. - ancestry.ca)11

Residence: 1935; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; "34 Bibby, Hugh, gentleman, Brighton" Canada Voters Lists, 1935, Northumberland Co., Brighton Village, pg. 15 of 126, ancestry.ca.12

Residence: 29 December 1950; Village Lot 26, Sanford St. North, Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Land Registry Records (Executors Grant 8376) show that Roy W. Wilson & Thomas C. Urquhart, executors for the estate of Marie V. b. Nesbitt granted "part with other land", Village Lot 26, Sanford St. North, Brighton Village, Northumberland Co. to Hugh C. Bibby $1. ITS Date: Dec 29 1950. Reg'n. Date: Jan 30 1951. (Ontario Land Registry Records, Northumberland Co., Village of Brighton, Book 008, pg. 177 of 253, page copied from OnLand.ca by Dan Buchanan, Aug 25 2023)13

Residence: 21 May 1960; Village Lot 26, Sanford St. North, Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Land Registry Records (Grant 25003) show that Hugh C. Bibby sold "part with other land", Village Lot 26, Sanford St. North, Brighton Village, Northumberland Co. to Ralph B. Cheer for $2. ITS Date: May 21 1960. Reg'n. Date: Jun 6 1960. (Ontario Land Registry Records, Northumberland Co., Village of Brighton, Book 008, pg. 177 of 253, page copied from OnLand.ca by Dan Buchanan, Aug 25 2023)13

Citations

Hugh Charles Bibby per FindaGrave.

Death*: 1945; Ontario; Date 1945 per Memorial.3

Residence: 28 June 1940; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Informant for Late Birth Reg'n. of his brother William Edward Bibby.2

Residence*: 14 June 1946; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Informant for Late Birth Reg'n. of his brother Hugh C. Bibby.2

Family: Anna May Vincent b. 1867, d. 1943

Marriage*: circa 1905; per memorial.; Principal=Anna May Vincent3

William Gibson1
